member.name: M:BeadandoBeseGabor.MainWindow.Deposite(BeadandoBeseGabor.Invoice,System.String)
member.summary: Definition of the deposition function, responsible for increasing the subject invoce available money with the given ammount

member.summary: Definition of the transfer function, responsible for transfering the given ammount from the subject invocie to the another invoice

member.name: M:BeadandoBeseGabor.MainWindow.Withdraw(BeadandoBeseGabor.Invoice,System.String)
member.summary: Definition of the withdraw function, responsible for decreasing the subject invoce available money with the given ammount

member.name: M:BeadandoBeseGabor.MainWindow.RefreshUI
